price: Ampa sε, Yayε nsoromma (akεseε) wͻ soro, εna Yama ayε fε ama wͻn a wͻhwε.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad jaʿalnā fī al-samāi burūjan wazayyannāhā lilnnāẓirīna
